issue.title: Tiktok
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.7

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.zhiliaoapp.musically

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Tracker: rtlog16-normal-useast5.tiktokv.us

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: www.vogue.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.vogue.com/slideshow/emma-corrin-harry-lambert-deadpool-and-wolverine-press-tour-style](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.vogue.com%2Fslideshow%2Femma-corrin-harry-lambert-deadpool-and-wolverine-press-tour-style) ### Comment > The video ads aren't disappearing on iOS. I understand that the rule is already in the Annoyances filter. > https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/df9df5b1b5c4cf91a9b47179c8c737495ff06788 > > In fact, I've confirmed that the ads disappear on Android. > > I updated the rules and waited for three minutes. I also cleared Safari's cache and restarted the device. However, the ads are still not disappearing on iOS. ### Screenshots
